module.label: Runtime Statistics
module.description: Access the global statistics of the SmartFoxServer instance

module.label: Zone Monitor
module.description: Monitor SmartFoxServer Zones, Rooms and Users behavior at runtime, and modify some of their settings live

module.label: Ban Manager
module.description: Check banned users lists, cancel bannings and ban other users/IPs

module.label: Zone Configurator
module.description: Create and delete SmartFoxServer Zones and static Rooms, or modify the settings of the existing ones

module.label: Server Configurator
module.description: Modify the global settings of the SmartFoxServer instance
